document.full_text: tampa bay's steve downie and pittsburgh's chris kunitz were handed one-game suspensions for dangerous hits to the head during game three of their eastern conference quarter-final, the nhl said on tuesday.
document.title: downie and kunitz handed one-game bans for head shots
